docs.snippet: Although easier access to digital equipment led to a surge of local photographers in Africa, it has yet to result in more opportunities for aspiring photojournalists.

docs.snippet: The idea of the “human” has brought us human rights, but it’s not enough to ensure justice.

docs.snippet: Maribel Cavero’s death in the South Bronx initially puzzled detectives. But swift evidence-gathering and help from a witness led to the arrest of a man they believe fired a gun nearly two blocks from the victim.
